text:
Stop wasting hours trying to learn AI.

I’ve already done it for you.

With one list. Zero confusion. And no fluff.

1. How to AI - how-to-ai.store 
- Start here if you’re new. Perfect for non-technical people to master AI.

2. OpenAI Academy - academy.openai.com
- Learn to use ChatGPT like a pro. Get more done, faster.

3. Claude prompting: https://lnkd.in/dJGkd68m.
- The official prompting guide by Claude.

4. Gemini by Google: https://lnkd.in/eB5fjyhd. 
- Learning AI guide for educators.

5. Coursera - https://lnkd.in/e8gQBJ9n 
- Learn Machine Learning with Andrew Ng.

6. Veo course - https://lnkd.in/dV69TkwH
- The official guide to master Veo, the video model from Google (which is the best on the market).

7. Midjourney course - https://lnkd.in/divdXvMp 
- The quick & easy (and free) guide for Midjourney v7.

8. Perplexity Labs - https://lnkd.in/dYWTYyrT 
- The most interesting Perplexity feature, explained.

9. To replace consultants - https://lnkd.in/dy8wC9Xg 
- This one is @ruben hassid. But useful to master search & slides.

10. Write a thesis with AI - https://lnkd.in/dY8H7UDK 
- How to write a detailed thesis with AI.

11. Claude from A to Z - https://lnkd.in/dJGkd68m 
- The official guide for Claude, from Claude's team.

12. ChatGPT images - https://lnkd.in/dh45EePJ 
- @ruben cover 80% within 12 slides. Not bad.

13. Guide to AI agent - https://lnkd.in/d_e2FP2u
- OpenAI made this (somehow) unknown guide.
 
14. Deepdive into LLMs - https://lnkd.in/d2eAsrsa 
- If you have 3 hours → an absolute goldmine.
